title: Emporio Armani
content:
hi im new to this site so i hope i am posting in the correct section.

i am currently working on a project for Emporio Armani and i was wondering if anyone knew the font that is used by the company. they have sent me a jpeg of the charaters but no font name or anything.

any help would be greatly appricated.

many thanks chris

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [fonts.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924092708/http:/typophile.com/files/fonts_1.jpg) | 28.49 KB |

 [‹ Heavy serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924092708/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44302 "Go to previous forum topic") [Lovely rounded typeface....Help!!!!!!! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924092708/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44296 "Go to next forum topic")
author: ChrisB

comments.content:
Looks a lot like [H&FJ Didot](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924092708/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_styles.php?productLineID=100004) with lining figures.

Why don’t you just ask them what font it is?
